review: Great product. Highly recommend to buy.
author: Daniel B. Muraskin

review: it's great definitely worth the money if you are a amazon prime member
author: Jean Dorn

review: It is amazing when it is working correctly, which is about 90% of the time.  There are some glitches here and there, but over all very happy to be able to watch Netflix and Amazon Prime videos.
author: Kelly

review: I would love to give this a proper review.Not sure if it cannot stream TV due to its own malfunction or the poor wireless reception in my home.  Our terrible Verizon router works fine for copper wire/RJ45 but just terrible for streaming.Hope to update this to 5 stars when our wireless issues are resolved.
author: N. Mancuso

review: Great idea.  Love access to my prime videos
author: Laura J. Roche

review: It really works well except occasionally there will be a slight pause in movies
author: Dennis W. Blankinship

review: It's work pretty good. The only con is not able to down load more apps but I'm sure they are working on it!Other than that works fine.
author: Annett

review: It is so great to watch the movies on a large screen TV.  I am really happy with the fire TV stick.  I am thinking about cancelling my cable and just streaming what I want to watch on the internet.
author: Jazz
